Comments_List: I learned how to pick up new information quickly, but efficiently taking this course. This was my first online course, and I now feel very comfortable with the process.

I enjoyed talking to people during the class during breakout sessions. I also enjoyed the explorations because they were very helpful with going over the topics we learned. Sometimes, on weeks when we had a problem set and exam due, the workload was more intense, but still manageable.
Yes, the summer set up was great
Yes, I would recommend this course to someone else because I had a positive experience. The professor and TA were great.
Yes, small class size and great teacher
